participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, Emily has a nurturing nature, especially when it comes to her career and family.
participant_1.background: i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. my daughter is a child prodigy.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and reflective, Tom enjoys reminiscing about his past and sharing stories from his teaching days.
participant_2.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i'm a retired gym teacher. i like watching war documentaries. i was poor growing up.
